GUILD_ID.description: The ID of the server you want to use the bot in

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: The ID of the channel you want to log commands in

MYSQL_CONNECTION_STRING.description: Your MySQL Connection string. If you don't have a database, leave this blank. Redacts the password for security.

JOIN_WEBSITE.description: The URL of the website you want to show users after they join a department

LEO_ROLE_ID.description: The ID of the role you want to give to LEOs. Ex. Police, Fire, EMS, etc.

CADET_ROLE_ID.description: The ID of the role you want to give to cadets

LIST_OF_DEPARTMENTS.description: A comma separated list of departments you want to use

JOIN_SERVER_ROLE_ID.description: The ID of the role you want to give to users that can join the FiveM server. Will be added when they are ready for training, kept if they complete training but removed if they fail. They will have to request training again to get the role back.

COOKIE_SECRET.description: A random string of characters used to secure your browser cookies

ROLEPLAY_ANOUNCEMENT_CHANNEL_ID.description: The ID of the channel you want to send roleplay announcements to

TIME_FORMAT.description: The format you want the time to be displayed in.

_START_LETTER.description: The leter to start each officers callsign with

_PROBIB_ID.description: The ID of the role you want to give to users after they complete training
